plot: A reality show following the antics of some crazy friends as they blow things up, drive tanks over cars, build rockets and generally creating havoc.
plot_en: A reality show following the antics of some crazy friends as they blow things up, drive tanks over cars, build rockets and generally creating havoc.

title: Tankboy
